title: Кришталеві джерела
overview: Lisa Kokhach, a 32-year-old children's dance instructor, finds her life turned upside down when she discovers she must become the guardian of a 10-year-old niece she never knew existed. In search of answers, Lisa arrives at an old yet picturesque house on the shore of Crystal Springs Lake. This house is more than just an inheritance — it's the crossroads of two people's fates united by a common goal. Her new acquaintance, the charismatic and stubborn Mykhailo Stolyar, is also vying for guardianship. Under one roof, they face not only the challenge of becoming a family for the girl but also a dangerous game of emotions that's impossible to ignore.
